# akhilāṇḍeśvari rakṣa mām

**Raga:** jujāvanti
**Tala:** ādi

## Anupallavi
akhilāṇḍeśvari rakṣa mām āgamasampradāyanipuṇe śrī

lambodara guruguha pūjite lambālakodbhāvite hasite

vāgdevatārādhite varade varaśailarājanute śārade


akhilāṇḍeśvari rakṣa mām

jambhārisambhāvite janārdananute jujāvanti rāganute
jhallīmaddaḷajharjaravādyanādamudite jñānaprade

sarvāśāparipūrakacakreśvaryai guptayoginyai

sarvārthasādhakacakreśvaryai kulottīrṇayoginyai

sarvarogaharacakreśvaryai rahasyayoginyai

sarvaraksākaracakreśvaryai nigarbhayoginyai

sarvasaubhāgyacakreśvaryai sampradāyayoginyai

sarvasiddhipradacakreśvaryai atirahasyayoginyai

naḷinyai parandhāmaprakīrtinyai

sarvasamkṣobhaṇacakreśvaryai guptatarayoginyai

trailokyamohanacakreśvaryai prakatayoginyai

sarvānandamayacakreśvaryai parāparādirahasyayoginyai

śrīcidānandanātha guruguhā yai sādhuhirdayasadrśavaśinyai

---

# akhilāṇdeśvaryai namaste

**Raga:** āarabhi
**Tala:** adi

## Pallavi
nikhilāgamasannutavaradāyai nirvikārāyai nityamuktāyai
samī sārabhī tibhañjanāyai śaraccandrikāsītaḷāyai
sāgaramekhalāyai tripurāyai

*

# akhilāṇdeśvaro rakṣatu

**Raga:** śuddhasāveri
**Tala:** rūpakam

## Pallavi
akhilāṇdeśvaro rakṣatu


jalaruhāptacandrāgnidṛśam jaṭājūtamīśādrīśam

valaripuvanditajagadīśam vāñchitārthadāyakamaniśam

---

# agastīśvaram

**Raga:** lali
**Tala:** miśra cāpu

## Anupallavi
agastīśvaram

## Madhyamakala
jalajanābhādinutam jāhnavīdharam satatam

jagajjīveśākaram jananavilayakaram

jalanidhipānārtham kalaśajenārcitām

nagajāhlādakaram nandīśam śankaram

su lalita guruguha janakam rakshitadhanikam

agastīśvaram arādhaye’ham haram saccidānandavallīśam

caranăm

---

# aṅgārakamāśrayāmyaham

**Raga:** suraṭi
**Tala:** rūpakam

## Pallavi
caranăm

aṅgārakamāśrayāmyaham

aṅgārakamāśrayāmyahām vinatāśritajanamandāraṃ

## Anupallavi
manomayakośātmakāmara guruguhā nanda

vanajamukhāmbujapadasumate dīnāvana nagadharaśaure

dhanañjayasārathe dayānidhe kṛpām kuru

māyāmayagokulavāsanirañjana śrī

anantabālakṛṣṇa māmava mukunda śrīhare

anantabālakṛṣṇa

tālam: ādi

## Madhyamakala
![Image](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

*
maŋgaḷaṃ kambugaḷaṃ mañjuḷatarapadayugaḷaṃ
maŋgaḷadāyakameṣaturaṅgaṃ makarottuṇgam

bhānucandragurumitram bhāsamānasukalatram
jānusthahastacitram caturbhujamativicitram

dānavasurasevitamandasmitavilasitavaktram
dharaṇīpradam bhrātīkārakam raktanetram
dīnarakṣakam pūjitavaidyanāthakṣetram
divyaughādi guruguha kaṭākṣānugrahapātram

śrīngārakameṣavīścikarāśyadhipatim
raktāṅgaṃ raktāmbarādidharam śaktiśūladharam

---

# anatabālakṛṣṇa

**Raga:** īśamanohari
**Tala:** Unknown

## Pallavi

# annapūrṇe viśālākṣi

**Tala:** ādi

# abhayāmbāyām

**Raga:** sahāna
**Tala:** triputa

## Anupallavi

## Madhyamakala
abhedapratipāditāyām ādi guruguha veditāyām

vibhavādivitaraṇanipuṇamantriṇyām

saccidānandarūpāyām svasvarūpāyām śrī

abhayāmbāyām bhaktim karomi

vijayakāraṇipuṇataradaṇḍinyām

abhayāmbāyām

# ambikāyāh abhayāmbikāyāh

**Raga:** kedāram
**Tala:** ādi

## Pallavi
amoghavaraśiva$^{13}$sārūpyānandānubhavapradāyinyāh
aprameya guruguhā dijananyāh brahmādipañcakakāriṇyāh

## Anupallavi
ambikāyāh abhayāmbikāyāh

## Madhyamakala
yamaniyamādyaṣṭāngayogaviṣayādinigrahakaraṇa-
mūlādhāramaṇipūrakādyabjhabhedanasphurakuṇḍalinī-
sahasradaḷabrahmarandhrasthakamalāntargataśivasammeḷana-
gaḷitaparamāmṛtabindusecanasamujjirmbhita-
nāḍīmukhavikāsakaraṇanijānubhūtiyoginyāh


śambarārihariśaśikuberapramukhopāsitanavayoginyāh
sāmkhyātārakamanaskarājayoginyāh śivabhoginyāh
bimbapratibimbarūpiṇyāh bindumaṇḍalavāsinyāh svarūpiṇyāh

ambikāyāh abhayāmbikāyāh tava dāso’ham
ādijagadambikāyāh

23 ānandanaprakāśam

# ānandanaprakāśam

## Madhyamakala

ānandāmṛtākarsini

# kamalāmbā samraksatu mām

**Raga:** āandabhairavi
**Tala:** Unknown

## Pallavi
kamalāmbā samraksatu mām

( prathamāvaraṇakīrtanam)


sumanasārādhitābjamukhī sundaramanahpriyakarasakhī
kamala jānanda bodhasukhī kāntātārapañjaraśukī

# kamalāmbām bhaja re

**Raga:** kalyāṇi
**Tala:** ādi

kamalāmbām bhaja re
( dvitīyāvaraṇakīrtanam)

# kamalāmbikāyāstava bhakto’ham

**Raga:** punnāgavarāli
**Tala:** rūpakam

## Pallavi
daśarathādinuta guruguha janakaśivabodhinyāh

atimadhutaravāṇyāh śarvāṇyāh kalyāṇyāh

kamalāmbikāyāstava bhakto'ham

daśakaraṇavṛttimarīcinigarbhayoginyāh śrī

sumaśarekṣukodaṇḍapāśāṅkuśapāṇyāh


kamalāmbikāyāstava bhakto’ham

( saṣṭyāvaraṇakīrtanam)

sakunkumādilepanāyai carācarādikalpanāyai

prabala guruguha sampradāyāntahkaraṇāyai

akaḷaṅkarūpavarṇāyai aparṇāyai suparṇāyai

tālam: aṭa

## Anupallavi
caranăm

śaṅkaryāh śrīkaryāh saṅgītarasikāyāh śrī

## Madhyamakala
sukaradhrtacāpabāṇāyai śobhanakaramanukoṇāyai

prakatacaturdaśabhuvanabharanāyai

sakalasaubhāgyadāya kāmbhoja caraṇāyai

samkṣobhiṇyādiśaktiyutacaturthāvaranāyai

---

# guruguhādanyam

**Raga:** balahamsa
**Tala:** jhampa

## Pallavi
guruguhā danyam na jāne’ham
guptāgamārthatatvaprabodhino

aruṇodayānandakoṭibrahmaṇḍākāra-
śivādidharāntatatvasvarūpiṇo

guruguhā ya bhaktānugrahāya guṇātītāya rūparahitāya
hariharaviriñcirūpāya saccidānādasvarūpāya śivāya

sakaḷāgamamantrasārajñāya satsampatpradāya sarvajñāya
sakaḷaniṣkaḷaprakāśakāya sāma rasya sampradāyakāya

guruguhā ya bhaktānugrahāya kumārāya namo namaste

## Madhyamakala
aharahahpra balahamsa prakāśātmano

daharavidyāpradāyakaparamātmano

sahajānandashitadāsaviśvāsinah

saccitsukhātmakaviśvavilāsino

sakalacandrabhāskaratjahprakāśinah

# cintaye mahālingamūrtim

**Raga:** paraju
**Tala:** ādi

## Pallavi
śrīkamalāpurasomāskandam cidambareśvaranaṭanānandam
śrīkālīśabhairavaspandam śivasvāmiśaila guruguha skandam


santatam madhyārjunapuravāsam bhṛhatkucāmbāsahavāsam
antaraṅgabhaktajanānāmatisamī paṛju mārgadarśitam

## Anupallavi
pākaśāsanādidevabirndaṃ pālitadāsajanādimukundam
śokādiharaṇapadāravindam śubhakaram karuṇārasakandam

## Charanam
cintaye mahāliṅgamūrtim cidrūpaspūrthim sukīrtim

## Madhyamakala
cintitārthadāyakaṃ jīveśvarabhedāpaham

cintāmaṇisvarūpam tāṇḍaveśvaram

ādimadhyāntavarjam nirādhāramākāśanādāntasthām

cintaye'ham sadā citsabhānāyakam

nantakotibrahmāṇdanātham vimalam

bhānukotibhāsvaram danticarmāmbaram dhanadahitam

sundaram sudhāmśumauliṃ śivam bhrāntivāraṇaṇipuṇam

śāntam munimahitam sa guruguham śankaram

santatam sāmbamīśaṃ mudhā bhāvaye'-

# puraharanandana

**Raga:** hamīr kalyāṇi
**Tala:** ādi

## Pallavi

puṇyajanapūjite nārāyaṇī jagadambike

bhaṇḍaprāņa bilahari bhaktajanānandakari

puṣpita śuddhavasante puṇḍarīkasadṛśakare

kedāre śasahāye guruguha veditahirdaye

pūrṇaphalapradacaraṇe sarasvatīmanohare

bilahari rāgah

śuddhavasanta rāgah

nārāyaṇī rāgah

dhvanisahite sahite hite te

vāsudevanatasaptasthānam vicitrayamabhayādinivāraṇam
vāsukikārkoṭakādidharaṇam varadharmasāmvardhanīramaṇam
dāsajanādidhanadhānyapradaṃ dhīratara guruguha pūjitapadam

śaktyādisamūhākārām śarabheśamadaharanacaturām

ksityāditatvāntarūpām kṣaṃkārānandavilepām

## Charanam
praṇatārtiharam namāmi satatam pañcanadakṣetraprakāśitam

---

**Tala:** cāpu

śrīdhareṇa rakṣito’ham bhūmipālasūkareṇa

vedasteyaduṣṭaharo vedādirakṣaṇah śrī

## Anupallavi
tālam: rūpakam

## Madhyamakala
māyāmayahittāpam tyaja re re

paramātmani niratiśayasukham vraja re re

mānasa guruguha rūpam bhaja re re

mānavajanmani samprāpte sati

satvaguṇopādhisahitasadāśivam svāvidyāsametajīvodbhavam

tatvam tāmasayutaviśvavaibhavam tārakeśvara mānandabhairavam

---

# mādhavo mām pātu

**Raga:** ānandabhairavi
**Tala:** miśra cāpu

## Pallavi
mānasaguruguha

262 mānasaguruguha

śatrughnavibhīṣaṇasugrīvapramukhādisevita

sītayā saha samsthita sucaritra paramapavitra

komaladharapallavapadakodaṇḍarāma ghanaśyāmala

guruguha mitra paṅkajamitravamśasudhāmbudhicandra

atrivasiṣṭādyanugrahapātra daśarathaputra maṇiranga valyādyalaṅkr̥ta

māmava paṭṭābhirāma jaya mārutisannuta nāma rāma

navaratnamaṇimantape vicitramaṇimayasiḥhāsane

chatracāmarakaradhritabharatalaksmaṇa-

vigrahābjanayana sampūrṇakāma raghurāma kalyāṇarāma rāma

medinīpāla rāmacandra

---

# māmava raghuvīra

**Raga:** dhanyāsi
**Tala:** miśra cāpu

## Pallavi
māyūranātham

ādityakoṭiprakāśam nandikeśamaprameyamabhayāmbikeśam
maheśam medinyādipañcabhūtāvakāśam mīnadhvajārim purārim

māyūranātham

māyūranāthamaniśaṃ bhajāmi māyāmayadharaṇīśaṃ tyajāmi

## Anupallavi
vedanuta guruguha nivāsam bhedayutaviśvavilāsam
$^{72}$modarūpamanovilāsam nādamayanavanavollāsam

pādatale padme divyatejomayi rakṣa mām

raṅgaramaṇi mārajanani viṣṇujāye

rañjani devatāpūjitaśrī guruguhe

dehi śriyam abjamālini drśyaviśvavilāse

ehi varalakṣmi sundari dīpyamāna-

māye citkale jaya rame maṅgaḷakara-

tālam: tiśra ekam

madhumadamoditahridaye sadaye mahādevasundareśapriye

nandīśanandita surabırdavandita guruguha guro

# raṅganāyakam

**Tala:** ādi

murāripramukhādyupāsitam mūlādhārakṣetrasthitam
parādicatvārivāgātmakam praṇavasvarūpavakratuṇḍam
nirantaram niṭilacandrakhaṇḍam nijavāmakaravidhṛtekṣudaṇḍam

## Anupallavi
bhūtādisamsevitacaraṇaṃ bhūtabhautikaprapañcabharaṇaṃ

## Madhyamakala
duṣṭavighnaharaṇaṃ śiṣṭabhaktabharaṇaṃ iṣṭaphaladacaraṇaṃ śiṣṭahirdviharaṇaṃ

nāmarūpadharam abhinava guruguha hridayam

---

# śrīkamalāmbā jayati

**Raga:** āhiri
**Tala:** rūpakam

## Pallavi
( navamāvaraṇakīrtanam)

śrīpurabindumadhyasthacintāmaṇimandirastha-

śivākāramañcasthitaśivakāmeśāṅkasthā

## Anupallavi
śrīngārarasakadambā madambā śrī kamalāmbā jayati
cidbimbapratibimbendubimbā śrī kamalāmbā jayati

sūkarānanādyarcitamahātripurasundarīm rājarājeśvarīm
śrīkarasarvānandamayacakravāsinīm suvāsinīm cintaye’ham di-

śrī kamalāmbā jayati ambā śrī kamalāmbā jayati
jagadāmbā śrī kamalāmbā jayati

kāmakalāpradarśinī sāmarasya nidarśinī

brahmamayaprakāśinī nāmarūpavimarśinī

vāmādiśaktipūjitaparadevatāyāh sakalam jātam

kāmādidvādaśabhirupāsitakādihādisādimantrarūpiṇyāh

## Madhyamakala
śokaharacaturapadayā mūkamukhyavākpradayā

# śrīkamalāmbike’vāva

**Raga:** ghaṇṭa
**Tala:** ādi

## Pallavi

'tyantarāgapāśadveṣāṅkuśadharakare’tirahasyayoginīpare


santaptahemasannibhadehe sadā’khaṇḍaikarasapravāhe
santāpaharatrikoṇagehe sakāmeśvariśaktisamūhe
santatam mukti ghaṇṭā maṇighoṣāyamānakavāṭadvāre a-
nanta guruguha vidite karāṅgulinakhodayaviṣṇudaśāvatāre

ekākṣari bhuvaneśvari īśapriyakari

śrīpativinute sitāsite śivasahite

śākambari śātodari candrakalādhari

ramāvāṇīsakhī rājayogasukhī

tālam: khẩn dịa ekam

362 śrīkṛṣṇaṃ bhaja mānasa

## Anupallavi
pākaśāsanādivinutacaraṇaṃ śokamohabhayaharaṇaṃ bhavataraṇaṃ

## Charanam
śrīkṛṣṇam bhaja mānasa

paṅkajāsanādidevamahitaṃ śrī guruguha vihitam ramāsahitam
paṅkajadaḷanayanam vaṭaśayanam guruvanapurādhīśam lokeśam

navanavagopastrīrāsakrīḍāveṣadharo harih

kamsacāṇūramardako kaunteyahitabodhako

# śrīgaṇeśātparam

**Raga:** ārdradeśi
**Tala:** jhampa

## Anupallavi
viśvapūjitakaḷebharāt śvetārkasumadharāt svetara-

mātaṅgavadanādu mārudradarśi tāt bhūtabhautika-

hṛdāyākāśasamsthitādyogirājārcitāt

## Charanam
vāgādipañcakavyāpārarahita-

# śrīguruguha

**Raga:** devakriyā
**Tala:** rūpakam

## Pallavi
śrīguruguha

śrī guruguha tārayāśu mām śaravaṇabhava
śrī guruguha tārayāśu mām surapatiśrīpati-
ratipativākpatikṣitipatipaśupatisevita śrī

bhogirājavinutapāda bhū devakriyā moda
yogirājayogabhedayuktamanolayavinoda


rāgādirahitahṛdayavibhāvitasuramunipūjita
tyāgādirājakumāra tāpatrayahara kumāra

paramātmaśrīcidānandanātha namaste jaya jaya

atmānubhavasārasamtrpte nirmukte

ātmakotibhakte anādimāyotpatte

# śrītyāgarājasya

**Raga:** rudrapriya
**Tala:** miśra cāpu

## Pallavi

amareśādipūjitasāyamkālasya atiśuddhamaddaḷādivādyalīlasya
navanandyādibhaktajanapālasya natasurāsurasamahatijālasya
kamalakalhāramālasya kāñcanamaṇimayacelasya
kamanīya guruguha mūlasya kamalāpurakṛtalīlasya

śrītyāgarājasya bhakto bhavāmi
kimcidajño’pyato’ham sarvajña evāsmi$^{102}$

vedāntavedyam nyagrodhavirksamūlavāsinam vallakī-

śrīdakṣiṇāmūrtimīśaṃ citprakāśaṃ praṇaumi

tālam: ādi

matimajjihvāgrasthitayā maṅgalapradayā sadayayā

śritajanapālayakayā sevakabhūpālayakayā

# sādhujanacitta

**Raga:** pūrṇapañcamam
**Tala:** triputa

## Charanam
sakalaniṣkaḷarūpamādyam saccidānandamanādyam
saguṇanirguṇavedyamanādyam samsārarogamādyamakḷedyam
prakātamāyācitracodyam prasiddhāmnāyāntavedyam
śukarahasyapratipādyam śubhakaraṃ hariharārādhyam

sādhujanacittatasarasmim sakalam brahma$^{139}$mayamāśraye

## Madhyamakala
svakalpitavidyāvidyam suruciram bhedyābhedyam

bodham śivasankalpavikalpam buddhasuddhanityanirvikalpam

śukavāmadevādicintyam sukhataram guruguha macintyam$^{140}$
